subject: Servlet Testing
msgSnippet: Hi Can I do servlet Unit Testing also using Junit. If so, how do I get started? Thanks & Regards Arathi ... The views of the author may not necessarily reflect
messageBody:
Hi

Can I do servlet Unit Testing also using Junit. If so, how do I get
started?

Thanks & Regards
Arathi
